Articles.Content:
Would anyone be willing to create and/or post a skybox with big nebulas in the background? Something like the Eagle Nebula or the EVE Online backdrop.

I see pictures of such skyboxes on the forums from time to time, but never a download link.

This one?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87311-Rareden-s-Real-8k-Skybox-for-Texture-Replacer

There is also several listed in the Texture Replacer thread, in the list the ones with the Black "G" include skyboxes.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-1-2-new-thread-the-old-one-is-broken

EDIT: After careful consideration, this may be the one you really wanted. Quite beautiful.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/70l6x6c7vkkcnoi/Nebula.zip?dl=0

Forum Post:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-BROKEN-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-1-2-%2820-12-2014%29/page164?p=1618196#post1618196

Edited February 11, 2015 by Alshain

EDIT: After careful consideration, this may be the one you really wanted. Quite beautiful.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/70l6x6c7vkkcnoi/Nebula.zip?dl=0

That's more what I was looking for. Thank you!
So I just tested it out, and the seams are really conspicuous in-game. Are there any others you could recommend?
Just the various ones linked in the Texture Replacer thread.
